item.title: Benefits
item.description: Gym & massage expense refund (LRS) As a Chalmers employee you have the right to be refunded for up to 2000SEK/year for expenses related to health and wellness. This is called Benify How to claim expenses and be refund - go to [insidan](http://www.chalmers.se/insidan) - on the right-most column select *Chalmers Plus* in the menu under 'E-tjanst', clic *visa* - insert CID and CID-password - click on 'wellness receipts' - follow instruction on how to register a receipt (useful instructions in english also under 'How do I register my expenses?

item.title: Emails
item.description: Setting up your Chalmers email account IMAP imap.chalmers.se - port: 993 username : CID Auth method: CID password Connection: SSL/TLS // Note : Thunderbird test doesn’t work correctly. SMTP smtp.chalmers.se : 587 username : CID Auth method: NTLM (TLS also works) Connection: STARTTLS (if required) iOS Detail setting from IT portal - Select Exchange account - On the first page, use ‘CID@chalmers.se’ - Domain: NET - Server: webmail.

item.title: Exams
item.description: Exam Registration / Check registered credits go to the Doctoral Portal click on “Login” (written in blue in the greyish submenu bar on the top of the page) enter your cid + password click on: “Examination, sign-up/cancel sign up” / “Create transcript of records, postgraduate studies” (important : make sure you are in the Doctoral Portal! item.title: Rooms
